        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading Cards -No 16:Pavlo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesekarten - Kein 16:Pavlo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes de Lecture - Aucun 16:Pavlo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cartões Da Leitura - Nenhum 16:Pavlo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schedi Della Lettura - Nessun 16:Pavlo</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Tarjetas De la Lectura - Ningún 16:Pavlo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a reading comprehension assignment of a passage from "Encounters with Animals" by Durrel.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Leseerfassenanweisung eines 
Durchganges "vom Treffen mit Tieren" durch Durrel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une attribution de compréhension de 
lecture d'un passage de "rencontre avec des animaux" par Durrel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma atribuição da compreensão da 
leitura de uma passagem do "encontro com animais" por Durrel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'assegnazione di comprensione della 
lettura di un passaggio "dall'incontro con gli animali" da Durrel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια ανάθεση κατανόησης ανάγνωσης μιας 
μετάβασης από "τις συγκρούσεις με τα ζώα" από Durrel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ésta es una asignación de la comprensión de la
lectura de un paso del "encuentro con los animales" por Durrel.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
